text: agnaq A yA#hi vIqtayaq ityAqhA-hva#taiqvaina#-maqgniM dUqtaM ~MvRu#NImahaq ityA#ha hUqtvaivaina#M ~MvRuNItEq &gninAq&gniH sami#ddhyataq ityA#haq sami#ndha Eqvaina#maqgnirvRuqtrANi# ja~gGanaqdityA#haq sami#ddha EqvAsmi#nnindriqyaM da#dhAtyaqgnEH stOma#M manAmahaq ityA#ha manuqta Eqvaina#mEqtAniq vA ahnA(gm)# rUqpANya# - [  ] 26
